description.value:
A small white gem that refracts light. One of the hardest nonmagical substances in the world.

This is used as the material component for the @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-spells.Item.EBXbuU6UgNza87rc]{Chromatic Orb} spell, which cannot be cast unless this component is carried by the caster.

This diamond can be crushed into diamond dust over 1 hour using smith's or tinker's tools. The result is a @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-spells.Item.AB3D1GOMjDWdoHBf]{Pinch of Diamond Dust}, valued at 25 gold, which can be used as a consumed material component in some spells.
